item.description: Half-orc Champion Fighter Background grew up with adoptive (human?) parents doesn’t speak half-orc no tragic past, just wanted to explore the world Important Relations Adventuring with [[Asurak]], [[The Bean Bois/Avaaros]], [[The Bean Bois/Davaelor]], [[The Bean Bois/Heilar]], [[Reznak]], [[Ruby]], and [[Runa]], and, newly also [[Sealion]] Had a budding romance with [[Syrja]]
